name: 'The U.S. Poet Laureate' Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What room was the President in while giving his media interviews?
questions.explanation:
Mural room.

	President Bartlet was talking to Leslie, a TV broadcaster from Philadelphia, via satellite when he made the comment that Governor Ritchie was a '22 caliber mind in a .357 magnum world'. The camera was still rolling when he made the comment. Supposedly, he didn't know the red light was still on which meant the camera was on.

questions.text: Who was in the room with the President during his interviews?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Toby was in the room at the time, but everyone thought Sam was in the room. He owned up to it with Congressman Watchell, but when Ainsley wanted to know how he could let it happen he said, "For everybody who works outside the building, I'll fall on the sword. But for everybody who works inside the building, I wasn't there!"

questions.text: What fruit was Josh's website named for?
questions.explanation:
Lemon.

	Josh's site was LemonLyman.com. He logged onto the site and started making comments which he got him in trouble with CJ when she found out about it.

Laura Dern.

	Laura Dern has acted in such movies as "Mask" and "Jurassic Park I and III". She is the daughter of Bruce Dern and Diane Ladd. Tabitha Fortis was a U.S. Poet Laureate speaking out against land mines.

True.

	True, he is an elitist, but he also has respect for those people who don't measure up.

questions.text: Who was given a promotion after the President made a comment about Governor Ritchie?
questions.explanation:
Ainsley.

	Sam told Ainsley about her promotion after he called her back from her vacation to help smooth things over after the President's comments. Ainsley told Sam she didn't know if she was going to take the position until she knew how much more her salary was going to be.

questions.text: Who made the comment, "What Josh doesn't know is that some of these people haven't taken their medication. Let's watch what happens now"?
questions.explanation:
Donna.

	Donna made this comment because Josh was having her type up his remarks for the website.

questions.text: What movie did CJ say she and Josh were acting out?
questions.correct: One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest
questions.explanation:
One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest.

	Josh told CJ she was Chief Bromden.

questions.text: Did CJ say the President called Governor Ritchie stupid?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	The press kept asking CJ questions about whether President Bartlet called Governor Ritchie stupid so she said, "Well I think this on may be unspinnable, and that certainly is saying something coming from my office. Yeah, he was calling him stupid."

questions.text: Who figured out that the President knew the green light was on during the interview?
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	It was at the end of the episode that CJ figured out the President knew the green light was still on when he made the comment that Governor Ritchie was a '22 caliber mind in a .357 magnum world'.
